event.executesql: EXEC MSDB.dbo.sp_send_dbmail @profile_name = 'WBCSQL01 Mail' ,@recipients = 'reservelink@woodforest.com' ,@copy_recipients = '' ,@subject = 'ReserveLink Processing - Reports' ,@body = 'Daily ReserveLink 2.0 Job Complete.
